title: Is bio-based chemistry Europe’s next industrial platform? [Advocacy Lab]
summary_full: As Europe’s chemical industry grapples with high energy costs, global competition and the pressure to decarbonise, companies are building new bio-based and circular chemical platforms
summary_public: As Europe’s chemical industry grapples with high energy costs, global competition and the pressure to decarbonise, companies are building new bio-based and circular chemical platforms
